interpretation: The waving hand emoji represents greetings, farewells, and goodbyes. It can also signify a desire to attract attention or acknowledge someone's presence. This card may indicate a need for communication or social interaction, or a message coming from someone important. It can also suggest a willingness to let go of something or someone. When appearing in a reading, the waving hand emoji encourages openness and friendliness, as well as a willingness to connect with others. It can also signify a positive outcome or resolution to a situation. Associated keywords include greeting, farewell, attention, connection, letting go, positive outcome.
